                            </ol>
                        </li>
                </ol>
            </nav>
    </div>
</div>

        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">

        <div id="dfp-tlb" class="everyonelovesstackoverflow everyoneloves__top-leaderboard"></div>            <div id="question-header" class="grid">
                    <h1 itemprop="name" class="grid--cell fs-headline1 fl1 ow-break-word"><a href="/questions/7118823/check-if-url-has-certain-string-with-php" class="question-hyperlink">Check if URL has certain string with PHP</a></h1>

            
<div class="pl8 aside-cta grid--cell" role="navigation" aria-label="ask new question">
        <a href="/questions/ask" class="d-inline-flex ai-center ws-nowrap s-btn s-btn__primary" >
            Ask Question
        </a>

            <div id="mainbar" role="main" aria-label="question and answers">

            

<div class="question" data-questionid="7118823"  id="question">

    
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118823">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This question shows research effort; it is useful and clear" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="82">82</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This question does not show any research effort; it is unclear or not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>

        <button class="js-favorite-btn s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py8" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="favorite (35)" data-selected-classes="fc-yellow-600">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconStar" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M9 12.65l-5.29 3.63 1.82-6.15L.44 6.22l6.42-.17L9 0l2.14 6.05 6.42.17-5.1 3.9 1.83 6.16z"/></svg>
            <div class="js-favorite-count mt8" data-value="35">35</div>
        </button>


</div>

            </div>

            
<div class="postcell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">

<p>I would like to know if some word is present in the URL.</p>

<p>For example, if word car is in the URL, like www.domain.com/car/ or www.domain.com/car/audi/ it would echo 'car is exist' and if there's nothing it would echo 'no cars'.</p>
    </div>

        <div class="post-taglist grid gs4 gsy fd-column">
            <div class="grid ps-relative d-block">
                <a href="/questions/tagged/php" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;php&#39;" rel="tag">php</a> <a href="/questions/tagged/string" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;string&#39;" rel="tag">string</a> <a href="/questions/tagged/url" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;url&#39;" rel="tag">url</a> 
            </div>
        </div>

    <div class="mb0 ">
        <div class="mt16 pt4 grid gs8 gsy fw-wrap jc-end ai-start">

<a name="7118928"></a>
<div id="answer-7118928" class="answer" data-answerid="7118928"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118928">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="193">193</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Try something like this. The first row builds your URL and the rest check if it contains the word "car".</p>

<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];


if (strpos($url,'car') !== false) {
    echo 'Car exists.';
} else {
    echo 'No cars.';
}
</code></pre>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2011-08-19T08:33:10"></time>
    <div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

    <div class="post-signature grid--cell fl0">

    <li id="comment-68948605" class="comment js-comment " data-comment-id="68948605">
        <div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
            <div class="comment-score">
            </div>
                    </div>
        <div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
            <div class="comment-body" style="display: block;" >
                
                <span class="comment-copy">This is a good solution but just be wary that this will match a URL that has car anywhere. For example <code>www.domain.com&#47;car-pricing</code> or <code>www.domain.com&#47;carparks</code> will validate and output <code>Car exists</code>. Maybe it doesn&#39;t matter in your case but for others it might be relevant!</span>
                
                    &ndash;&nbsp;<a href="/users/1732515/javacadabra"
                       title="2,652 reputation"
                       class="comment-user">Javacadabra</a>
                <span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span title="2016-11-29 13:06:34Z" class="relativetime-clean">Nov 29 '16 at 13:06</span></span>
                                                            </div>
        </div>

<a name="28875202"></a>
<div id="answer-28875202" class="answer" data-answerid="28875202"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="28875202">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="54">54</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>I think the easiest way is:</p>

<pre><code>if (strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "car") !== false){
// car found
}
</code></pre>
    </div>

<a name="7118868"></a>
<div id="answer-7118868" class="answer" data-answerid="7118868"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118868">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="19">19</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>$url = " www.domain.com/car/audi/";
if (strpos($url, "car")!==false){
    echo "Car here";
}
else {
   echo "No car here :(";
}
</code></pre>

<p>See <a href="http://php.net/manual/en/function.strpos.php" rel="noreferrer"><code>strpos</code> manual</a></p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">

    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118867">

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>if( strpos( $url, $word ) !== false ) {
    // Do something
}
</code></pre>

    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="28136877">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>

                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>strstr didn't exist back then?</p>

<pre><code>if(strstr($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "car")) {
   echo "car found";
}
</code></pre>

<p>This must be one of the easiest methods right?</p>
    </div>

<div id="answer-51906858" class="answer" data-answerid="51906858"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="51906858">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>

        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>worked for me with php</p>

<pre><code>if(strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], 'shop.php') !== false){
echo 'url contains shop';
}
</code></pre>

    </div>
    <div class="user-details" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
        <a href="/users/3111651/shuhad-zaman">Shuhad zaman</a><span class="d-none" itemprop="name">Shuhad zaman</span>

<a name="7118875"></a>
<div id="answer-7118875" class="answer" data-answerid="7118875"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118875">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="2">2</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Have a look at the <a href="http://php.net/manual/en/function.strpos.php" rel="nofollow">strpos</a> function:</p>

<pre><code>if(false !== strpos($url,'car')) {
    echo 'Car exists!';
}
else {
    echo 'No cars.';
}
</code></pre>
    </div>

<a name="17245816"></a>
<div id="answer-17245816" class="answer" data-answerid="17245816"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="17245816">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="1">1</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];


if (!strpos($url,'car')) {
    echo 'Car exists.';
} else {
    echo 'No cars.';
}
</code></pre>

<p>This seems to work.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">

<div id="answer-18435471" class="answer" data-answerid="18435471"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="18435471">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="1">1</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Surely this is the correct way round....</p>

<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];


if (!strpos($url,'mysql')) {
echo 'No mysql.'; //swapped with other echo statement
} else {
echo 'Mysql exists.';
}
</code></pre>

<p>Otherwise its reporting the opposite way it should...</p>
    </div>

<a name="7118921"></a>
<div id="answer-7118921" class="answer" data-answerid="7118921"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118921">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="0">0</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>You can try an .htaccess method similar to the concept of how wordpress works.</p>

<p>Reference: <a href="http://monkeytooth.net/2010/12/htaccess-php-how-to-wordpress-slugs/" rel="nofollow">http://monkeytooth.net/2010/12/htaccess-php-how-to-wordpress-slugs/</a></p>

<p>But I'm not sure if thats what your looking for exactly per say..</p>
    </div>

<a name="20756789"></a>
<div id="answer-20756789" class="answer" data-answerid="20756789"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="20756789">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="0">0</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>The URL parameters and received from a global variable called <code>$_GET</code> which is in fact an array. So, to know if a URL contains a parameter, you can use the <code>isset()</code> function.</p>

<pre><code>if (isset($_GET['yourparametername'])) {
//The parameter you need is present
}
</code></pre>

<p>Afterwards, you can create separate array of such parameter you need to attach to a URL. </p>

<p>For example:</p>

<pre><code>if(isset($_GET['param1'])) {
\\The parameter you need is present
$attachList['param1'] = $_GET['param1'];
}

if(isset($_GET['param2'])) {
$attachList['param2'] = $_GET['param2];
}
</code></pre>

<p>Now, to know whether or not, you need a <code>?</code> symbol, just count this array</p>

<pre><code>if(count($attachList)) {
    $link .= "?";
    // and so on
}
</code></pre>

<p>Update:</p>

<p>To know if any parameter is set, just count the $_GET</p>

<pre><code>if(count($_GET)) {
     //some parameters are set
}
</code></pre>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2013-12-24T07:32:52"></time>

<div id="answer-41668563" class="answer" data-answerid="41668563"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="41668563">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="0">0</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>if ( stristr( SITE_HOST, 'your site' ) ) {
    $protocol = ( !empty( $_SERVER['HTTPS'] ) &amp;&amp; $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on' ) ? 'https://' : 'http://';
    $request = ( !empty( $_SERVER['HTTP_X_ORIGINAL_REQUEST'] ) ) ? $_SERVER['HTTP_X_ORIGINAL_REQUEST'] : $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
    echo $protocol .'your site'. $request;
}
</code></pre>
    </div>

<div id="answer-28013747" class="answer" data-answerid="28013747"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="28013747">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="-1">-1</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
if ( strpbrk($url, 'test') ) {
    // Do something...
}
else {
    // Do another thing
}
</code></pre>

<p>(>PHP 5)</p>
    </div>

            <div class="comment-body" style="display: block;" >
                
                <span class="comment-copy">This does answer the question but there are better methodes to do so...  This function returns a string starting from the character found... <code>strpbrk()</code> documentation can be found <a href="http://php.net/manual/en/function.strpbrk.php" rel="nofollow noreferrer">here</a></span>

<div id="answer-51260041" class="answer" data-answerid="51260041"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">

<p>you can use this function as this code sir</p>

<pre><code> if((strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'],'car') !== false))
        echo'&lt;h3 class=" edit-top"&gt;Car Exist&lt;/h3&gt;';
    else
        echo'&lt;h3 class=" edit-top"&gt;Not&lt;/h3&gt;';
</code></pre>

            <div id="hireme"></div>

                                </span>
                            </a>
                        </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
                    <div class="topbar-dialog leftnav-dialog js-leftnav-dialog dno">
                <div class="left-sidebar js-unpinned-left-sidebar" data-can-be="left-sidebar" data-is-here-when="sm"></div>
            </div>
    </li>
</ol>

    </div>
</header>

    <link itemprop="image" href="https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/stackoverflow/img/apple-touch-icon.png?v=c78bd457575a">

    <div class="inner-content clearfix">

        <div id="dfp-tlb" class="everyonelovesstackoverflow everyoneloves__top-leaderboard"></div>            <div id="question-header" class="grid">
                    <h1 itemprop="name" class="grid--cell fs-headline1 fl1 ow-break-word"><a href="/questions/7118823/check-if-url-has-certain-string-with-php" class="question-hyperlink">Check if URL has certain string with PHP</a></h1>

            
<div class="pl8 aside-cta grid--cell" role="navigation" aria-label="ask new question">
        <a href="/questions/ask" class="d-inline-flex ai-center ws-nowrap s-btn s-btn__primary" >
            Ask Question
        </a>
</div>

        </div>
            <div id="mainbar" role="main" aria-label="question and answers">

            

<div class="question" data-questionid="7118823"  id="question">

    
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118823">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This question shows research effort; it is useful and clear" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="82">82</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This question does not show any research effort; it is unclear or not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>

        <button class="js-favorite-btn s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py8" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="favorite (35)" data-selected-classes="fc-yellow-600">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconStar" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M9 12.65l-5.29 3.63 1.82-6.15L.44 6.22l6.42-.17L9 0l2.14 6.05 6.42.17-5.1 3.9 1.83 6.16z"/></svg>
            <div class="js-favorite-count mt8" data-value="35">35</div>
        </button>


</div>

            </div>

            
<div class="postcell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">

<p>I would like to know if some word is present in the URL.</p>

<p>For example, if word car is in the URL, like www.domain.com/car/ or www.domain.com/car/audi/ it would echo 'car is exist' and if there's nothing it would echo 'no cars'.</p>
    </div>

        <div class="post-taglist grid gs4 gsy fd-column">
            <div class="grid ps-relative d-block">
                <a href="/questions/tagged/php" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;php&#39;" rel="tag">php</a> <a href="/questions/tagged/string" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;string&#39;" rel="tag">string</a> <a href="/questions/tagged/url" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;url&#39;" rel="tag">url</a> 
            </div>
        </div>

    <div class="mb0 ">
        <div class="mt16 pt4 grid gs8 gsy fw-wrap jc-end ai-start">
            <div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

                <span class="comment-copy">This also depends if you just looking for the word car or if you also want the type of car or cars too. You might need preg_match, strpos, explode and in_array/array_search, really just depends. if you want something simple, just use strpos as suggested</span>

<a name="7118928"></a>
<div id="answer-7118928" class="answer" data-answerid="7118928"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118928">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="193">193</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Try something like this. The first row builds your URL and the rest check if it contains the word "car".</p>

<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];


if (strpos($url,'car') !== false) {
    echo 'Car exists.';
} else {
    echo 'No cars.';
}
</code></pre>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2011-08-19T08:33:10"></time>
    <div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

    <div class="post-signature grid--cell fl0">
<div class="user-info user-hover">
    <div class="user-action-time">

    </div>

    </div>

                    data-addlink-disabled="true">


    <li id="comment-20325504" class="comment js-comment " data-comment-id="20325504">

    <li id="comment-68948605" class="comment js-comment " data-comment-id="68948605">
        <div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
            <div class="comment-score">
            </div>
                    </div>
        <div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
            <div class="comment-body" style="display: block;" >
                
                <span class="comment-copy">This is a good solution but just be wary that this will match a URL that has car anywhere. For example <code>www.domain.com&#47;car-pricing</code> or <code>www.domain.com&#47;carparks</code> will validate and output <code>Car exists</code>. Maybe it doesn&#39;t matter in your case but for others it might be relevant!</span>
                
                    &ndash;&nbsp;<a href="/users/1732515/javacadabra"
                       title="2,652 reputation"
                       class="comment-user">Javacadabra</a>
                <span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span title="2016-11-29 13:06:34Z" class="relativetime-clean">Nov 29 '16 at 13:06</span></span>
                                                            </div>
        </div>
    </li>

<a name="28875202"></a>
<div id="answer-28875202" class="answer" data-answerid="28875202"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="28875202">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="54">54</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>I think the easiest way is:</p>

<pre><code>if (strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "car") !== false){
// car found
}
</code></pre>
    </div>

<a name="7118868"></a>
<div id="answer-7118868" class="answer" data-answerid="7118868"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118868">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="19">19</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>$url = " www.domain.com/car/audi/";
if (strpos($url, "car")!==false){
    echo "Car here";
}
else {
   echo "No car here :(";
}
</code></pre>

<p>See <a href="http://php.net/manual/en/function.strpos.php" rel="noreferrer"><code>strpos</code> manual</a></p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2011-08-19T08:27:58"></time>

<div id="answer-7118867" class="answer" data-answerid="7118867"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118867">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>

        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>if( strpos( $url, $word ) !== false ) {
    // Do something
}
</code></pre>

<a name="28136877"></a>
<div id="answer-28136877" class="answer" data-answerid="28136877"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="28136877">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="3">3</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>strstr didn't exist back then?</p>

<pre><code>if(strstr($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "car")) {
   echo "car found";
}
</code></pre>

<p>This must be one of the easiest methods right?</p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2015-01-25T13:21:54"></time>
    <div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

<a name="51906858"></a>
<div id="answer-51906858" class="answer" data-answerid="51906858"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="51906858">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>

        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>worked for me with php</p>

<pre><code>if(strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], 'shop.php') !== false){
echo 'url contains shop';
}
</code></pre>
    </div>

<a name="7118875"></a>
<div id="answer-7118875" class="answer" data-answerid="7118875"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118875">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="2">2</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Have a look at the <a href="http://php.net/manual/en/function.strpos.php" rel="nofollow">strpos</a> function:</p>

<pre><code>if(false !== strpos($url,'car')) {
    echo 'Car exists!';
}
else {
    echo 'No cars.';
}
</code></pre>
    </div>

<a name="17245816"></a>
<div id="answer-17245816" class="answer" data-answerid="17245816"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="17245816">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="1">1</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];


if (!strpos($url,'car')) {
    echo 'Car exists.';
} else {
    echo 'No cars.';
}
</code></pre>

<p>This seems to work.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">

<a name="18435471"></a>
<div id="answer-18435471" class="answer" data-answerid="18435471"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="18435471">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="1">1</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Surely this is the correct way round....</p>

<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];


if (!strpos($url,'mysql')) {
echo 'No mysql.'; //swapped with other echo statement
} else {
echo 'Mysql exists.';
}
</code></pre>

<p>Otherwise its reporting the opposite way it should...</p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">

<a name="7118921"></a>
<div id="answer-7118921" class="answer" data-answerid="7118921"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="7118921">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="0">0</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>You can try an .htaccess method similar to the concept of how wordpress works.</p>

<p>Reference: <a href="http://monkeytooth.net/2010/12/htaccess-php-how-to-wordpress-slugs/" rel="nofollow">http://monkeytooth.net/2010/12/htaccess-php-how-to-wordpress-slugs/</a></p>

<p>But I'm not sure if thats what your looking for exactly per say..</p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2011-08-19T08:32:45"></time>

<a name="20756789"></a>
<div id="answer-20756789" class="answer" data-answerid="20756789"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="20756789">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="0">0</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>The URL parameters and received from a global variable called <code>$_GET</code> which is in fact an array. So, to know if a URL contains a parameter, you can use the <code>isset()</code> function.</p>

<pre><code>if (isset($_GET['yourparametername'])) {
//The parameter you need is present
}
</code></pre>

<p>Afterwards, you can create separate array of such parameter you need to attach to a URL. </p>

<p>For example:</p>

<pre><code>if(isset($_GET['param1'])) {
\\The parameter you need is present
$attachList['param1'] = $_GET['param1'];
}

if(isset($_GET['param2'])) {
$attachList['param2'] = $_GET['param2];
}
</code></pre>

<p>Now, to know whether or not, you need a <code>?</code> symbol, just count this array</p>

<pre><code>if(count($attachList)) {
    $link .= "?";
    // and so on
}
</code></pre>

<p>Update:</p>

<p>To know if any parameter is set, just count the $_GET</p>

<pre><code>if(count($_GET)) {
     //some parameters are set
}
</code></pre>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2013-12-24T07:32:52"></time>

<a name="41668563"></a>
<div id="answer-41668563" class="answer" data-answerid="41668563"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="41668563">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="0">0</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>if ( stristr( SITE_HOST, 'your site' ) ) {
    $protocol = ( !empty( $_SERVER['HTTPS'] ) &amp;&amp; $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on' ) ? 'https://' : 'http://';
    $request = ( !empty( $_SERVER['HTTP_X_ORIGINAL_REQUEST'] ) ) ? $_SERVER['HTTP_X_ORIGINAL_REQUEST'] : $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
    echo $protocol .'your site'. $request;
}
</code></pre>
    </div>

<a name="28013747"></a>
<div id="answer-28013747" class="answer" data-answerid="28013747"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="28013747">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="-1">-1</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<pre><code>$url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
if ( strpbrk($url, 'test') ) {
    // Do something...
}
else {
    // Do another thing
}
</code></pre>

<p>(>PHP 5)</p>
    </div>

                <span class="comment-copy">This does answer the question but there are better methodes to do so...  This function returns a string starting from the character found... <code>strpbrk()</code> documentation can be found <a href="http://php.net/manual/en/function.strpbrk.php" rel="nofollow noreferrer">here</a></span>

                       title="597 reputation"

<a name="51260041"></a>
<div id="answer-51260041" class="answer" data-answerid="51260041"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="51260041">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="-1">-1</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>you can use this function as this code sir</p>

<pre><code> if((strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'],'car') !== false))
        echo'&lt;h3 class=" edit-top"&gt;Car Exist&lt;/h3&gt;';
    else
        echo'&lt;h3 class=" edit-top"&gt;Not&lt;/h3&gt;';
</code></pre>
    </div>

                   title="Use comments to ask for more information or suggest improvements. Avoid comments like “+1” or “thanks”."

                    <div class="question-status">
        <h2>                    <b>protected</b> by <a href="/users/466862/mark-rotteveel">Mark Rotteveel</a> <span dir="ltr"><span title="2018-08-18 09:42:51Z" class="relativetime">Aug 18 '18 at 9:42</span></span>
</h2>
        <p>

    <div class="inner-content clearfix">

        <div id="dfp-tlb" class="everyonelovesstackoverflow everyoneloves__top-leaderboard"></div>            <div id="question-header" class="grid">
                    <h1 itemprop="name" class="grid--cell fs-headline1 fl1 ow-break-word"><a href="/questions/2313107/how-do-i-make-a-simple-crawler-in-php" class="question-hyperlink">How do I make a simple crawler in PHP?</a></h1>

            
<div class="pl8 aside-cta grid--cell" role="navigation" aria-label="ask new question">
        <a href="/questions/ask" class="d-inline-flex ai-center ws-nowrap s-btn s-btn__primary" >
            Ask Question
        </a>

<div class="question" data-questionid="2313107"  id="question">

    
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="2313107">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This question shows research effort; it is useful and clear" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="62">62</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This question does not show any research effort; it is unclear or not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>

        <button class="js-favorite-btn s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py8" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="favorite (77)" data-selected-classes="fc-yellow-600">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconStar" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M9 12.65l-5.29 3.63 1.82-6.15L.44 6.22l6.42-.17L9 0l2.14 6.05 6.42.17-5.1 3.9 1.83 6.16z"/></svg>
            <div class="js-favorite-count mt8" data-value="77">77</div>
        </button>


</div>

            </div>

            
<div class="postcell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">

<p>I have a web page with a bunch of links. I want to write a script which would dump all the data contained in those links in a local file.</p>

<p>Has anybody done that with PHP? General guidelines and gotchas would suffice as an answer.</p>
    </div>

        <div class="post-taglist grid gs4 gsy fd-column">
            <div class="grid ps-relative d-block">
                <a href="/questions/tagged/php" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;php&#39;" rel="tag">php</a> <a href="/questions/tagged/web-crawler" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;web-crawler&#39;" rel="tag">web-crawler</a> 
            </div>
        </div>

    <div class="mb0 ">
        <div class="mt16 pt4 grid gs8 gsy fw-wrap jc-end ai-start">
            <div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

            </div>

                        <h2 data-answercount="16">
                                16 Answers

                        <div>

<a name="2313270"></a>
<div id="answer-2313270" class="answer accepted-answer" data-answerid="2313270"  itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="2313270">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="87">87</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Meh. Don't <a href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1732348/regex-match-open-tags-except-xhtml-self-contained-tags">parse HTML with regexes</a>.</p>

<p>Here's a DOM version inspired by Tatu's:</p>

<pre><code>&lt;?php
function crawl_page($url, $depth = 5)
{
    static $seen = array();
    if (isset($seen[$url]) || $depth === 0) {
        return;
    }

    $seen[$url] = true;

    $dom = new DOMDocument('1.0');
    @$dom-&gt;loadHTMLFile($url);

    $anchors = $dom-&gt;getElementsByTagName('a');
    foreach ($anchors as $element) {
        $href = $element-&gt;getAttribute('href');
        if (0 !== strpos($href, 'http')) {
            $path = '/' . ltrim($href, '/');
            if (extension_loaded('http')) {
                $href = http_build_url($url, array('path' =&gt; $path));
            } else {
                $parts = parse_url($url);
                $href = $parts['scheme'] . '://';
                if (isset($parts['user']) &amp;&amp; isset($parts['pass'])) {
                    $href .= $parts['user'] . ':' . $parts['pass'] . '@';
                }
                $href .= $parts['host'];
                if (isset($parts['port'])) {
                    $href .= ':' . $parts['port'];
                }
                $href .= dirname($parts['path'], 1).$path;
            }
        }
        crawl_page($href, $depth - 1);
    }
    echo "URL:",$url,PHP_EOL,"CONTENT:",PHP_EOL,$dom-&gt;saveHTML(),PHP_EOL,PHP_EOL;
}
crawl_page("http://hobodave.com", 2);
</code></pre>

<p><strong>Edit:</strong> I fixed some bugs from Tatu's version (works with relative URLs now).</p>

<p><strong>Edit:</strong> I added a new bit of functionality that prevents it from following the same URL twice.</p>

<p><strong>Edit:</strong> echoing output to STDOUT now so you can redirect it to whatever file you want</p>

<p><strong>Edit:</strong> Fixed a bug pointed out by George in his answer. Relative urls will no longer append to the end of the url path, but overwrite it. Thanks to George for this. Note that George's answer doesn't account for any of: https, user, pass, or port. If you have the <a href="http://us3.php.net/manual/en/book.http.php" rel="noreferrer">http</a> PECL extension loaded this is quite simply done using <a href="http://us3.php.net/manual/en/function.http-build-url.php" rel="noreferrer">http_build_url</a>. Otherwise, I have to manually glue together using parse_url. Thanks again George.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2010-02-22T18:47:18"></time>

<a name="24041887"></a>
<div id="answer-24041887" class="answer" data-answerid="24041887"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
            <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
                

<div class="js-voting-container grid fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="24041887">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="up vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10z"/></svg></button>
        <div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" itemprop="upvoteCount" data-value="15">15</div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" title="This answer is not useful" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="down vote" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon m0 iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26z"/></svg></button>


                <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--item fc-green-500 ta-center p4 d-none" title="loading when this answer was accepted..." tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="accepted"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8z"/></svg></div>

</div>

            </div>
            

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="text">
<p>Here my implementation based on the above example/answer.</p>

<ol>
<li>It is class based </li>
<li>uses Curl</li>
<li>support HTTP Auth</li>
<li>Skip Url not belonging to the base domain</li>
<li>Return Http header Response Code for each page</li>
<li>Return time for each page</li>
</ol>

<p>CRAWL CLASS:</p>

<pre><code>class crawler
{
    protected $_url;
    protected $_depth;
    protected $_host;
    protected $_useHttpAuth = false;
    protected $_user;
    protected $_pass;
    protected $_seen = array();
    protected $_filter = array();

    public function __construct($url, $depth = 5)
    {
        $this-&gt;_url = $url;
        $this-&gt;_depth = $depth;
        $parse = parse_url($url);
        $this-&gt;_host = $parse['host'];
    }

    protected function _processAnchors($content, $url, $depth)
    {
        $dom = new DOMDocument('1.0');
        @$dom-&gt;loadHTML($content);
        $anchors = $dom-&gt;getElementsByTagName('a');

        foreach ($anchors as $element) {
            $href = $element-&gt;getAttribute('href');
            if (0 !== strpos($href, 'http')) {
                $path = '/' . ltrim($href, '/');
                if (extension_loaded('http')) {
                    $href = http_build_url($url, array('path' =&gt; $path));
                } else {
                    $parts = parse_url($url);
                    $href = $parts['scheme'] . '://';
                    if (isset($parts['user']) &amp;&amp; isset($parts['pass'])) {
                        $href .= $parts['user'] . ':' . $parts['pass'] . '@';
                    }
                    $href .= $parts['host'];
                    if (isset($parts['port'])) {
                        $href .= ':' . $parts['port'];
                    }
                    $href .= $path;
                }
            }
            // Crawl only link that belongs to the start domain
            $this-&gt;crawl_page($href, $depth - 1);
        }
    }

    protected function _getContent($url)
    {
        $handle = curl_init($url);
        if ($this-&gt;_useHttpAuth) {
            curl_setopt($handle, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_ANY);
            curl_setopt($handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, $this-&gt;_user . ":" . $this-&gt;_pass);
        }
        // follows 302 redirect, creates problem wiht authentication
//        curl_setopt($handle, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, TRUE);
        // return the content
        curl_setopt($handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, TRUE);

        /* Get the HTML or whatever is linked in $url. */
        $response = curl_exec($handle);
        // response total time
        $time = curl_getinfo($handle, CURLINFO_TOTAL_TIME);
        /* Check for 404 (file not found). */
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        curl_close($handle);
        return array($response, $httpCode, $time);
    }

    protected function _printResult($url, $depth, $httpcode, $time)
    {
        ob_end_flush();
        $currentDepth = $this-&gt;_depth - $depth;
        $count = count($this-&gt;_seen);
        echo "N::$count,CODE::$httpcode,TIME::$time,DEPTH::$currentDepth URL::$url &lt;br&gt;";
        ob_start();
        flush();
    }

    protected function isValid($url, $depth)
    {
        if (strpos($url, $this-&gt;_host) === false
            || $depth === 0
            || isset($this-&gt;_seen[$url])
        ) {
            return false;
        }
        foreach ($this-&gt;_filter as $excludePath) {
            if (strpos($url, $excludePath) !== false) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }

    public function crawl_page($url, $depth)
    {
        if (!$this-&gt;isValid($url, $depth)) {
            return;
        }
        // add to the seen URL
        $this-&gt;_seen[$url] = true;
        // get Content and Return Code
        list($content, $httpcode, $time) = $this-&gt;_getContent($url);
        // print Result for current Page
        $this-&gt;_printResult($url, $depth, $httpcode, $time);
        // process subPages
        $this-&gt;_processAnchors($content, $url, $depth);
    }

    public function setHttpAuth($user, $pass)
    {
        $this-&gt;_useHttpAuth = true;
        $this-&gt;_user = $user;
        $this-&gt;_pass = $pass;
    }

    public function addFilterPath($path)
    {
        $this-&gt;_filter[] = $path;
    }

    public function run()
    {
        $this-&gt;crawl_page($this-&gt;_url, $this-&gt;_depth);
    }
}
</code></pre>

<p>USAGE:</p>

<pre><code>// USAGE
$startURL = 'http://YOUR_URL/';
$depth = 6;
$username = 'YOURUSER';
$password = 'YOURPASS';
$crawler = new crawler($startURL, $depth);
$crawler-&gt;setHttpAuth($username, $password);
// Exclude path with the following structure to be processed 
$crawler-&gt;addFilterPath('customer/account/login/referer');
$crawler-&gt;run();
</code></pre>
    </div>
    <div class="grid mb0 fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
        <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2014-06-04T15:44:14"></time>

<p>Check out PHP Crawler</p>

<p>See if it helps.</p>
